reviewText: Girlfriends - The Complete Seventh Season is a great season even though one girlfriend is missing. Toni was muchly missed, she left the show at the end of season 6 (still not sure why). Tracee Ellis Ross is my favorite actress, her character Joan is so neurotic, obsessive, and delightful. I wish this show would have gotten a proper good-bye, Season 8 was never treated with respect. Season 7 does not disappoint, reserve your copy today!
Title: Girlfriends: Season 7

reviewText: MY COLLECTION IS ALMOST COMPLETE. I'M A FAN 4EVER!! WHAT CAN YOU NOT SAY ABOUT THE TOP RATED SHOW OF ALL TIME. THANKS AMAZON
Title: Girlfriends: Season 7

reviewText: I must say that for christmas I got the entire season of GF!! I have already watched 1-3 and I'm just loving watching it again. I watched the show when it was on air and I loved these characters. I too hated that Jill Marie (Toni) left the show and all throughout I hoped that they would manage to somehow bring her back end. I didn't re4ally like that Monica chick and she didn't even come close to making another girlfriend (in my opinion), I think it was how she was brought into the show. I'm so excited that BET has decided to bring back THE GAME I can't wait for Jan 11. So ecxited!!!
Title: Girlfriends: Season 7

reviewText: Love these ladies.  Love the writing.  Love the direction.  I'm on the verge of getting the whole series.  I have to take a break from time to time, but the process is sooo much fun.
summary: My Girlfriends...There To Make Me Laugh!!!
Title: Girlfriends: Season 7

reviewText: I really felt the loss of the Toni Childs character this season.  And although the cast is still incredible, the chemistry was a bit off as they forced the Monica (Keesha Sharpe) character into that missing "girlfriend" spot.Joan meets a new guy while volunteering in New Orleans after Hurricane Katrina; Lynn tries to get her music career off the ground by singing @ a karaoke bar; William & Monica marry and separate almost immediately afterwards.  (Off screen Toni refuses to talk to or see Joan.)The only story line I really enjoyed was Maya, Darnell & Jabari moving to the 'burbs and their experiences.  I also loved seeing more of Darnell as he pursued his dream of working on a NASCAR pit crew only to quit and try to buy back his garage.As far as features we get Mara Brock Akil (show runner) speaking briefly about a few episodes. I'm glad I finally got to add this season to my collection - GIRLFRIENDS is one of those shows that doesn't lose its replay value. I can watch it over & over and still enjoy it.
Title: Girlfriends: Season 7

reviewText: Its even better when you own all of them and play them one after another. A must have in everyone's collection.

reviewText: I love this show, and I am so excited that the seventh season is on its way to Amazon.com for me to purchase. I already own seasons 1-6 and I have watched them over and over. This is a wonderful show with an awesome cast. Girlfriends is truly one of my all-time favorites.

reviewText: The girlfriends had reached their peak, professionally, personally, spiritually, etc...  This was a well written season and everything came together nicely.
Title: Girlfriends: Season 7

reviewText: I am 25 years old and such a girlfriends fan. I love this show and everyone in my family and even my 5 year old son Jayden knows it. He can actually name the characters lol. Amazon always notifies me when every season is being released on dvd and I would pre-ordered them. I found out that itunes was selling season 7 and 8 for my itouch ipod so I defintely bought it but now I'm putting in a order for season 7 because I want to have the whole collection. Thats another thing about me...I like collecting dvds. On the weekends I chill and turn on a dvd on my 52 inch tv in the living room. I have a lot of dvds. But overall I'm happy for it to be out on dvd and I wish the show never ended...it is still my favorite.
Title: Girlfriends: Season 7
